bibl.title: A Point of Contact Between the Archives of Pompeius Niger and of Tryphon the Weaver?
bibl.seg: Anastasia Maravela & Jens Mangerud, A Point of Contact Between the Archives of Pompeius Niger and of Tryphon the Weaver?

The private letter S.B. VI, 9121 (= P. Osl. Inv. 1460) [rééd.: Nikos Litinas, The Expressions "To Annoy" as Used in Alexandria and "To Sit on a Donkey", ChrEg 88 (2013) No. 176, pp. 307-312]. - Σεραποῦς or Σεραηοῦς? - The background for the dispute and a new reading of ll. 3-5. - A connection to the archive of Tryphon the weaver? - The connection with Pompeius Niger.
